lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The 4.8 mln shares represented by the group includes four retirement funds covering various groups of New York City workers, the California State Teachers Retirement System and seven church-related groups.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The statement said senior officials of the company have stated publicly that they regard apartheid as "a system wholly at variance with the principles on which our group of companies has operated all over the world for many years."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Goldin appeared at the news conference with Gordon Smith, treasurer of the ministers and missionaries benefit board of the American Baptist Churches.
